alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Gila Bend; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Northwest Valley; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:43PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 630 PM MST... At 543 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from near Cotton Center to 8 miles northeast of Freeman to 7 miles northwest of Casa Grande to near Coolidge Airport. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and generate blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Gilbert, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Casa Grande, Apache Junction, Florence, Coolidge, Tolleson, Gila Bend, Laveen, Cashion, Gold Canyon, Tonopah and Sun Lakes. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 90 and 144, and between mile markers 149 and 204. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 201. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 113 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
